rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with ample natural light and Vastu-aligned orientation.
Spacious living room with colonial decor elements, large windows for sunlight, and Vastu-compliant layout.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, ensuring smooth circulation in line with Vastu principles.
Fully equipped modern kitchen designed for functionality and colonial aesthetics, placed in a southeast corner following Vastu guidelines.
Two-car garage located on the southwest side to ensure privacy and easy access while adhering to local building norms.
Primary bathroom for guests, designed with water elements in mind per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door located in the northeast for auspicious entry as per Vastu.
Secondary exit aligned with energy flow.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the northeast quadrant as per Vastu for prosperity.
Additional bedroom featuring natural light and ventilation aligned with colonial design principles.
Private bathroom for the master suite, designed considering water element placement per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Central staircase ensuring smooth circulation between floors in compliance with local norms and safety standards.

rooms.description: Private gymnasium designed with colonial architectural elements and ample space for equipment. Features soundproofing and optimal ventilation.

openings.description: Large garden area with a colonial-style patio for relaxation and outdoor activities.
